root.name: Gumboy: Crazy Adventures
root.description: OverviewGumboy: Crazy Adventures is a puzzle game developed by CINEMAX and published by Meridian 4 for the PC platform.The player has control over gumboy and has to jump, bounce, roll and fly across several worlds to survive. Gumboy can also change shape.PC System RequirementsMinimum:Windows 2000/XP SP21 GHz Processor256 MB System RAM32 MB OpenGL 3D Video Card50 MB Available hard disk spaceDirectX 8.0 or higherRecommended:1.6 GHz ProcessorGeForce 5200 / Radeon 9600 or better video card
